resume.profile: I’m a web developer with over four years experience working on ecommerce and loyalty applications. I know how to create apps and websites that are fast, responsive and SEO friendly. I’m looking for freelance, consulting or project based opportunities that will allow me to work remotely.

note.text: Built and developed several Single Page Apps built with React, Redux, Relay
Added/extended queries and mutations to GraphQL server
Setup webpack for new apps with SASS, Babel, Flow, React Storybook, etc
Migrated old apps from Backbone and JQuery to stack listed above
Implemented server­side rendering for apps with Redux and Relay
Maintained local nginx in docker container to route service requests in development
Managed several other apps including an inventory management system, a content management system, an analytics platform, pages with SalesForce integrations, and parts of our customer facing website
Created a monolithic app with Node, Postgres and Sequelize to sync inventory across multiple data sources
Developed tools to allow internal users to manage purchasing and product merchandising
Developed and maintained customer facing website
Setup CI pipeline to allow simultaneous development/deployment
Consolidated data to run analyses on Customer Acquisition Costs and Ad Spend
Configured and deployed client and server­side software for large restaurants chains including Panera Bread and Red Mango
Developed understanding of networking through hours of debugging LAN and Firewall issues
Managed projects working directly with directors and executives to design and deliver technical solutions to marketing and financial business requirements
Spearheaded software training working with corporate and franchise branch owners
